/usr/local/software/jureca/Stages/2019a/software/psmpi/5.2.2-1-GCC-8.3.0/bin/mpicxx  -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic -Wl,-wrap=main CMakeFiles/hello.exe.dir/hello.cpp.o  -o hello.exe -Wl,-rpath,/p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64 /p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64/libhpx_init.a /p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64/libhpx_wrap.a /p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64/libhpx_iostreams.so.1.3.0 /p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64/libhpx_init.a /p/project/cslai/wu/source/hpx_1.3.0/build/Release-mpi/lib64/libhpx.so.1.3.0 -latomic -ldl -lrt -lboost_filesystem -lboost_program_options -lboost_system -lpthread -lboost_filesystem -lboost_program_options -lboost_system -ljemalloc -lhwloc -lmpicxx -lmpi -lpthread -ljemalloc -lhwloc
